Wo Xiang Niao Niao

by Mojon Twins

Released Apr 7, 2017
Players 1
License LGPLv3

Download ROM

Description

Lin Lin has to collect at least eight flies on her way to the toilet (which is located uhm… straight to the right) for the King to let her use it. The path is full of baddies which can hurt Lin Lin very badly, but luckily she can bounce on them with her butt. Lin Lin shouldn't let the screen go faster than her, she must RUN. And she still has to collect the flies. And pee. [v1.3e]
